name: Remembering Never- THIS HELL IS HOME WILD ASS PACKAGE
description:
This package is for 
-1 Black LP
-1 Red/Grey LP
-1 CD
-4 Shirts (Pig, Cover, Amerika Is..., Fred Hampton)
-1 Flag mesh hat
-1 Pullover hoodie
-1 Bookmark

Includes digital download card as well.
Includes fun items such as stickers, buttons, bookmarks, etc while supplies last.
(NOTE: If Hoodie size is different than shirt size, specify during checkout)

THIS HELL IS HOME. After a 7 year hush, Remembering Never return to incite an audible riot. Being no strangers to controversial subject matter, RN has returned with 12 songs that pick up where God Save Us left off, honing in on the more technical side without sacrificing sheer brutality and melody. 
Okay, enough of the hype talk, this fucking record is wild as shit.  

1. Sharpening The Sword
2. Monkey Suit
3. Electroligion
4. Glass Ceiling Serenade
5. All Praise The Victims Of The Middle Passage
6. Shit Slinger
7. Chasing Ghosts
8. Excuses & Denials
9. United Stockholm Syndrome
10. Holiday In Siberia
11. Jesus Envy
12. Overseer To Officer  
36. ? (CD ONLY)

name: DTR Media Party Pack++
description:
**The next 2 people that order this will receive the most rare, Swamp Green color of the Remembering Never "This Hell is Home" LP. We only made 100 of these, about 10 of them immediately went to our personal collection, family, friends, etc. The other 90 were only available at local independent record stores for Black Friday.  Once these two are gone, the webstore will move this to sold out.**

This would cost well over $100 buck if you ordered each individually. 

Please read as the picture is out-dated! Grab one of every DTR release in one easy to own package (God Save Us 12" and Bishop Bless the Dead 7" not included anymore! totally sold out!). With just one easy to make payment! We will try to hook you up with the most rare color of each vinyl. Also, expect goodies in each package like posters or stickers, buttons, patches, download cards, or any other junk we have laying around.

Included is one of each of
DTR-003 Bishop/The Red Baron Split CD
DTR-004 Jump The Shark "Staring Death" CD
DTR-005 Alarmed Self Titled 7"
DTR-006 Bishop "Drugs" CD
DTR-007 Bishop "Drugs" 12"

description:
We couldn't help but notice that a few of the Bishop Vinyl colors are almost sold out! Bishop Bless the Dead 7" and Asylum 7" have both been sold out of their most rare colors for a bit but they are both almost totally out! We wanted to give you an opportunity to scoop up some of the most rare colors left before it's too late! 

This package includes every Bishop item that DTR has released! We will ship the most rare color of each record left and this package gives you a good discount!

Included are 
DTR-003 Bishop/The Red Baron Split 
DTR-006 Bishop "Drugs" CD 
DTR-007 Bishop "Drugs" 12" 
DTR-009 Bishop "Asylum" 7" 

Plus! Two posters and any other potential goodies we may have laying around.

name: Bishop Asylum 7"
description:
We are almost sold out of these! For a better "deal" get the DTR party pack ++, DTR Vinyl party pack, or the Bishop party pack!!

INFO:   Alligator City's favorite bastard sons, Bishop, return with another testament to the ornery. The three tracks on their latest 7" were recorded during the "Drugs" sessions and shelved specifically for this release, consisting of two of their best tracks to date as well as a very unlikely cover of Further Seems Forever's "Pictures Of Shorelines." The first press of 1,000 also contains a surprise and will NEVER be released in MP3 format.


TRACK LISTING:
1. 	 The Guilt
2. 	 Snakes & Fakes
3. 	 Pictures Of Shorelines

name: Forty Winters "Reflection" + Free sticker and poster and button!
description:
Every order comes with a free Reflection Poster, a free Forty Winters Sticker and a free button (buttons are almost sold out!) + we will probably give you even more free stuff!!!

Forty Winters has been culminating their blend of metal by weeding out weak ends and "Reflection" proves that. The south Florida based up-and-comers are a sigh of relief from the run-of-the-mill mosh metal machine that seems to spew out the same sound over again. Forty blends their influences of metal and hardcore naturally and the result is pure chaos. Upping their riffing quite a bit while toying with haunting melodies, while Xavier belts out menacing guttural but inspiring lyrics about life and the parasites that infiltrate it. The songs on "Reflection" are short bursts of catchy break-neck mayhem.  "Reflection" is sure to give the top dogs in the game a run for their money. Hide your woman and children. 


1. Plight 2. Resume Carnage 3. Delta-9 4. Cam-Pain 5. King Me 6. Body Harvest
7. Abominable Times 8. From the Mouths of Monsters 9. Foundation 10. Scales 11. Reflection

name: Everymen- When Water's Thicker Than Blood 12" LP
description:
When Water's Thicker Than Blood, the debut full length from Lake Worth's best kept secret, Everymen. Ten tracks of organic, folky, punky, loud, raspy greatness in an easy to own LP. Available on 2 (most rare now sold out!) limited colors.  

Track list: 
1. What You See Is What You Get 
2. Good & Evil 
3. Yellow Porch Blues 
4. Bottle Of Tears 
5. Don't Rain On My Parade 
6. Nothing Left To Lose 
7. Full Bucket 
8. Apocalyptic Lullabies 
9. Not A Good Long Term Plan 
10. A Song For Cowboy

75 grey/purple splatter 
125 black 
300 blood red

*This package comes with one of every color LP.

CD/Digital version available on Wayward Parade Entertainment.

options.name: Double Pack! The more rare Black   the most common beautiful blood red color!

name: Make It Reign Sound Asleep as the World Burns CD
description:
Comes with a free Make it Reign Button, a free poster and a free sticker!! 
Forming in the dead Reno, Nevada winter, Make It Reign is the latest and greatest new face of metal the west coast has to offer. The melancholy lyrics compliment the doomy harmonies and massive breakdowns create a heaviness of Crowbar-like proportions, with the straight forwardness of Earth Crisis and the thrash of Slipknot thrown in for added bite. Make It Reign have trekked across the west coast multiple times, in true DIY fashion and continue to leave the jaws of audiences floored wherever they perform. Singer Tony Medellin is no stranger to tour life, having done hard time fronting straight edge powerhouse, xAFBx. This time around Tony has honed his skills as a front-man and writer. Their debut full length is due to drop this spring to light a fire under the ass of the metal community. Same can be said for their video of "Powerkill", directed by Shawn Shannon. 
Sound Asleep As The World Burns is your soundtrack to judgement day.  

Track Listing
1. When It Reigns It Pours
2. Sleeping With Fire
3. Billy Mitchell Weebe
4. Kiss The Dead
5. The Polaroid
6. A Hell of Heaven
7. Three Years Later
8. Powerkill
9. Transams

name: Hivemind "Foreboding Winds" 7"
description:
INFO:   Merging sonic violence with raw lyrical rage, Hivemind appear on the earth like a thorn in the side of typical standard American hardcore. "Foreboding Winds" is the unsettling debut from south Florida's latest and greatest rookies, serving as the launching point to catapult the unknown to the familiar. Combining the speed of Slayer, the malevolence of Converge, and the heaviness of Crowbar, Hivemind will no doubt reinvent the face of creative yet beautifully violent underground music. Now available on colored vinyl.


TRACK LISTING:
1. 	 Empty Voyage
2. 	 The Delusionist
3. 	 Iron Curtain
4. 	 Isolation/Desolation
